justification: Acknowledges B’s desire for floor via a stable pocket QB, but overlooks that B trusts rankings and prefers young ascending players—making a trade of Tier 1 RB Marcus Reed unlikely. Sending two vets (Harris, Campbell) for Reed + a young QB conflicts with B’s profile and urgent-win needs. Rationale is generic (floor vs. ceiling), ignores SOS specifics and value imbalance. Some two-sided thinking, but shallow and optimistic p_accept.
